Dimensions.Definition: Describes how users can easily access and interact with the app without any obstacles.

Sub-Dimensions.Definition: The app's ability to quickly alert users when they receive an emergency notification. Fast response, immediate timing. Focus on timeliness.
The app's ability to alert users based on the type and severity of the emergency. Important alerts. Loud warnings
The app's ease of use, including quick response time and accessibility. Fast, easy, simple, affordable, many features, very useful
Users' confidence in the app's underlying structure, such as its codebase, ensuring no privacy violations or tracking.

Dimensions.Definition: The extent to which notifications accurately represent emergencies to users.

Sub-Dimensions.Definition: Providing users with up-to-date information about emergencies and the actions to take. Very relevant and immediate information. Fast updates. Valuable data
Ensuring users have a comprehensive representation of emergencies and the necessary counteractions. Usually has lots of information available
Delivering correct and precise information about emergencies and the corresponding actions to take. Live Maps, information, knowledge, forecasts
Maintaining coherence in the representations of emergencies and the recommended counteractions. Easy to understand.
Providing users with representations of non-trivial emergencies that pose immediate threats. Valid alerts. Life saving.
Building users' confidence in the accuracy of representations and the effectiveness of the suggested counteractions.

Dimensions.Definition: The extent to which information in the alert message enables users to take effective actions.

Sub-Dimensions.Definition: Enabling users to quickly take protective actions based on the provided information.
Offering users actionable recommendations to respond to emergencies in their environment.
Instilling in users the belief that they can effectively carry out projected actions by relying on the information from the emergency notification.
